resources.string:
DNSSetter

DNSSetter lets you change the DNS servers on your mobile connection (3G, 4G, etc.).
 
Warning! Your device must be rooted!
 
The app is currently using the "setprop" method. This might not work for you. If so, please let me know so I can add other methods.
